pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyautd3[autd3 library](https://github.com/shinolab/autd3) for python3.9+version: 13.0.0## Install```pip install pyautd3```or from this repository```pip install git+https://github.com/shinolab/autd3.git#subdirectory=python```## RequirementsIf you are using Linux/macOS, you may need to install and run pyautd3 as root.```sudo pip install pyautd3sudo python>>> import pyautd3```## Examplesee [example](./example)## LICENSEMIT# AuthorShun Suzuki, 2022-2023
